channel.title: [PI] Updating Cache
channel.description:
Hey all, might sound like a complete idiot posting this, but i've only ever coded "Old school" Servers, and used 474 as the most updated cache, but i want to update my client to a 659.
I'm using PI and my question is, how can i update my client to load a 659 cache and be compatable with my server?
